name: Pass the Plate
text: Pass the Plate is a platform designed to help improve food sustainability by connecting grocery stores and resturants to soup kitchens, pantries and homes in need to provide them with surplus food that needlessly gets wasted and other food that has the same destiny if it isn't consumed the same day. I created it with a team while in Google's CSSI summer program google's CS summer program. We created it under 3 days after learning to use a python framework called Jinja2 which allows for database interactions. Check out the site and its code on github below ↓

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
text: This is a tic tac toe python game built from scratch in under 2 hours. Its very simple in both design and execution. Go check out the demo or my code on github. Enjoy ↓

name: Sunflower Field - Python Turtle Art
text: I designed this game using python turtle art and it randomly generates flowers with perspective, clouds, day, and night.
